channel.title: Should I start playing?
channel.description: Basically I made an account, and got some alright stats in F2P whilst it was free. I mainly trained skills. Once the trial was over, I didn't really want to pay for membership, but now I am debating as I have been trying to stay out of trouble. Should I start playing again to keep my time busy? Would anybody here play with me?

item.title: Should I start playing?
item.dc:creator: @xFaceless xFaceless
item.description:
@xFaceless wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:13, topic:546376”]I got hooked at the idea when it first came out. now it’s more easy to play but same concept I fell in love with. game is too easy but I still get bored when I have nobody to play with.

Jagex has always been sell outside/disappointing. they’ve given up on so many projects but meh. I still pay for funorb so Idc lol[/quote]

Have a cookie for reading my mind man.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

I got hooked at the idea when it first came out. now it’s more easy to play but same concept I fell in love with. game is too easy but I still get bored when I have nobody to play with.

Jagex has always been sell outside/disappointing. they’ve given up on so many projects but meh. I still pay for funorb so Idc lol

Read full topic

item.title: Should I start playing?
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

I have started to notice a little nag in my head that is telling me to try OSRS out, but considering OSRS has overloads and other 500+ revision items it puts me off. The original idea was that we missed the 2007 RuneScape. This isn’t 2007 RuneScape.

Some people like it which is fair enough, but to me the damage has already been done. I have now accepted that nostalgia is just in the mind, and cannot be relived. I don’t support Jagex any longer because I feel that they wouldn’t support me.

Sell outs.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I start playing?
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Elrick:

Despite hating their company system (microtransactions, etc.) the game always has been and I think always be addicting in a lot of its aspects. I have been going back and forth about playing it too, but I’m not quite convinced yet.

I got on rs3 yesterday after old school and it’s a joke they push every player into there store and buying stuff. It’s a complete joke. I find myself enjoying old school more and more as I play

Read full topic
